Dread Knight

Description

The Dread Knight is an undead warrior found in the later levels of the dungeon. He is a formidable opponent related to the Necromancer class and Lich subclass.

Stats

* HP: High (scales with dungeon level) * Attack Skill: Very high * Defense Skill: High * Damage: High (scales with dungeon level) * Armor: High DR * EXP: High * Speed: Normal * Max Level: Limited by dungeon level

Abilities

* Undead Nature: Immune to certain status effects (poison, fear, etc.) * Heavy Attacks: Inflicts significant damage * High Defense: Difficult to defeat with physical attacks * Dark Magic: May use dark magic abilities

Location

* Found in Necropolis levels * Part of the undead theme of the necropolis area

Strategy

* Use magic or special abilities to bypass physical defense * Keep distance when possible to avoid heavy melee attacks * Be prepared with healing potions for the tough encounter * Consider using ranged attacks or spells

Content Verification

* Information source: Java class DreadKnight.java * Stats verification: Extracted directly from DreadKnight.java class properties * Special abilities: Based on implementation in DreadKnight.java * Last updated: December 2025, source: Remixed Dungeon 1.9.3

Source Code

* Java: DreadKnight.java * Related: Undead.java * Strings: DreadKnight strings
